title: Add/Improve tests to cover Gemini code_execution RNG verification
description: Fix the dice distribution tests so they actually exercise Gemini code_execution (code_execution evidence + RNG verification), then improve coverage to prevent regressions in RNG detection parsing (aliases, imports, numpy). Current distribution tests only hit roll_dice tool and can be skipped, so they miss parser bugs in gemini_code_execution.
acceptance_criteria:
- Add/adjust tests that execute Gemini code_execution path (not roll_dice tool only) and validate rng_verified behavior.
- Include cases for common RNG import patterns (random.randint, from random import randint, import numpy as np + np.random.randint).
- Ensure tests fail when code_execution used but RNG absent, and pass when RNG present.
- Tests are part of default test suite (not optional CLI flags) or clearly documented for CI inclusion.
